qas.question: What radio station format was sometimes regarded as a type of adult contemporary?
What type of music was predominantly played on smooth jazz stations?
Along with Kenny G and Dave Koz, what artist was featured on smooth jazz stations?
What other format of station were smooth jazz artists sometimes featured on?

context: In its early years of existence, the <a0_0>smooth jazz<a0_0/> format was considered to be a form of AC, although it was mainly <a1_0>instrumental<a1_0/>, and related a stronger resemblance to the <a3_0>soft AC<a3_0/>-styled music. For many years, artists like <a2_0>George Benson<a2_0/>, Kenny G and Dave Koz had crossover hits that were played on both smooth jazz and soft AC stations.
